biotools.summary: BGvaris a comprehensive database for blood group immunogenetics. It contians human blood group alleles belonging to International Society of Blood Transfusion (ISBT) approved human blood group systems. The resource integrates relevant data from a range of public sources.

bioschemas.name: BGvar
